feed.title: Coin Control, Send crash on MacOS X

entry.title: Coin Control, Send crash on MacOS X
entry.summary: The sender has removed the setFocus() calls that happen after Send is clicked. However, the program now crashes due to something else within Qt. The suggested solution is to replace a loop that deletes widgets with ->deleteLater() to avoid any potential crashes caused by deleting a QObject while pending events are waiting to be delivered.
